member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.BatchRequestPayload
member.summary: Represents the final JSON payload for a Microsoft Graph batch request. Has a property named "requests" which is a list of Request objects.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.BatchRequestPayload.Requests
member.summary: The "requests" array that Graph expects, each element having an Id, Method, Url, etc.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.BatchRequestPayload.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request
member.summary: Represents a single request to Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD) in a batch scenario. Compatible with .NET 4.7 or .NET Standard 2.0.

member.name: F:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request.AllowedMethods
member.summary: A set of allowed HTTP methods for this request (GET, PUT, PATCH, POST, DELETE).

member.name: F:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request._method
member.summary: Backing field for the HTTP method.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of this request (e.g. "1", "2", "3"). Typically used to distinguish multiple requests in a single batch.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP method (GET, PUT, PATCH, POST, DELETE). The setter validates that the method is allowed, otherwise throws an ArgumentException.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL (endpoint) that this request will call (e.g. "/users", "/groups/{id}", etc.).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request.Body
member.summary: Gets or sets the body of the request as a hashtable, useful for PowerShell scenarios.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request.Headers
member.summary: Gets or sets the headers of the request as a hashtable (key-value pairs).

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation for debugging.
member.returns: String describing the request Id, Method, Url.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Commands.NewPSEntraIDBatchRequest
member.summary: Cmdlet that receives Request objects from the pipeline and produces multiple objects, each containing up to 20 sub-requests. In each chunk, request Ids are reassigned to "1", "2", etc. to comply with the Microsoft Graph batch limit of 1..20 sub-requests per batch.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Commands.NewPSEntraIDBatchRequest.InputObject
member.summary: An array of Request objects coming from the pipeline. Each item is a sub-request definition (method, url, body, etc.).

member.name: F:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Commands.NewPSEntraIDBatchRequest._buffer
member.summary: Internal buffer to accumulate up to 20 requests before emitting a batch payload.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Commands.NewPSEntraIDBatchRequest.BeginProcessing
member.summary: Called once before pipeline input is processed.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Commands.NewPSEntraIDBatchRequest.ProcessRecord
member.summary: Called once for each pipeline block of Request objects. We accumulate them, and each time we hit 20, we emit a new BatchRequestPayload with Ids reindexed from "1" up to "n".

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Commands.NewPSEntraIDBatchRequest.EndProcessing
member.summary: Called after all pipeline input has been processed. If there's any leftover (20) requests in _buffer, we emit one final payload.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Commands.NewPSEntraIDBatchRequest.EmitOnePayload(System.Collections.Generic.List{PSMicrosoftEntraID.Batch.Request})
member.summary: Helper method to create a single BatchRequestPayload from up to 20 Request objects, reindexing their Ids from "1" to the number of requests in this chunk.
member.param: A list of up to 20 Request objects.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Contacts.Contact

member.summary: Email address of the contact.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Contacts.Contact.MailNickname
member.summary: Mail nickname (alias).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Contacts.Contact.CompanyName
member.summary: Company name of the contact.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Contacts.Contact.Department
member.summary: Department of the contact.

member.summary: Business phone numbers.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Contacts.Contact.MobilePhone

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Contacts.Contact.OfficeLocation
member.summary: Office location of the contact.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Contacts.Contact.PreferredLanguage
member.summary: Preferred language for communication.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Contacts.Contact.ProxyAddresses
member.summary: Proxy addresses associated with the contact.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Environment
member.summary: What environment this service should connect to.

member.summary: Global Microsoft cloud https://login.microsoftonline.com

member.name: F:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Environment.USGov

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Groups.GroupAdditionalProperty
member.summary: Represents a group additional property in Microsoft Entra ID. This class provides properties for group identification, contact information, settings, and membership rules.

member.summary: Gets or sets the nickname or alias of the group's email.

member.summary: Gets or sets the display name of the group.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Groups.GroupAdditionalProperty.HideFromAddressLists

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Groups.GroupAdditionalProperty.HideFromOutlookClients
member.summary: True if the group isn't displayed in Outlook clients, such as Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Groups.GroupAdditionalProperty.AllowExternalSenders
member.summary: Indicates if people external to the organization can send messages to the group.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Groups.GroupAdditionalProperty.AutoSubscribeNewMembers
member.summary: Indicates if new members added to the group are autosubscribed to receive email notifications.

member.summary: Gets or sets the prepaid units available under this SKU.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.ServiceAnnouncement.ViewPoint.IsFavorited
member.summary: Indicates whether the message is marked as favorite.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.AssignedLicense
member.summary: Represents an assigned license in Microsoft Entra ID. This class contains properties for identifying the service SKU and the plans that are disabled under this license.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.AssignedLicense.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates an empty assigned license.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.AssignedLicense.SkuId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier (GUID) for the service SKU.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.AssignedLicense.DisabledPlans
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of disabled plans under this license.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.ServicePlan
member.summary: Represents a service plan in an Office 365 subscription. This class provides properties to hold the service plan's unique ID, name, applicable assignments, and provisioning status.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.ServicePlan.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates an empty service plan.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.ServicePlan.ServicePlanId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the service plan.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.ServicePlan.ServicePlanName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the service plan.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.ServicePlan.AppliesTo
member.summary: Gets or sets the target object to which the service plan can be assigned.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.ServicePlan.ProvisioningStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets the provisioning status of the service plan.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.SubscriptionSku
member.summary: Represents an Office 365 subscription SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) for a user. This class provides properties to hold information about the subscription's unique ID, SKU details, and assigned service plans.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.SubscriptionSku.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates an empty subscription.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.SubscriptionSku.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the license detail object.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.SubscriptionSku.SkuId
member.summary: Unique identifier (GUID) for the service SKU.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.SubscriptionSku.SkuPartNumber
member.summary: Unique SKU display name.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.LicenseManagement.SubscriptionSku.ServicePlans
member.summary: List of service plans associated with the license. Contains information about the specific services included in the subscription.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User
member.summary: Represents a user in Microsoft Entra ID (formerly Azure AD). This class provides properties to hold user profile, contact information, and licensing details.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.UserPrincipalName
member.summary: The user principal name (UPN) used as the login name.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.CreatedDateTime
member.summary: The date and time the user was created.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.Mail
member.summary: The email address of the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.MailNickname
member.summary: The nickname or alias used in the user's email.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.ProxyAddresses
member.summary: A collection of proxy addresses associated with the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.UserType
member.summary: The type of user, such as "Member" or "Guest".

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.AccountEnabled
member.summary: Indicates if the user account is enabled.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.GivenName
member.summary: The first name of the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.Surname
member.summary: The last name (surname) of the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.DisplayName
member.summary: The display name of the user, shown in the UI.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.EmployeeId
member.summary: The employee ID associated with the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.JobTitle
member.summary: The job title of the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.Department
member.summary: The department where the user works.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.OfficeLocation
member.summary: The office location of the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.CompanyName
member.summary: The company name associated with the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.City
member.summary: The city where the user is located.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.PostalCode
member.summary: The postal code of the user's location.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.Country
member.summary: The country where the user is located.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.UsageLocation
member.summary: The usage location of the user, used for licensing purposes.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.MobilePhone
member.summary: The mobile phone number of the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.BusinessPhones
member.summary: A collection of business phone numbers for the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.FaxNumber
member.summary: The fax number associated with the user.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.AssignedLicenses
member.summary: The licenses assigned to the user.

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.User.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.UserGuest
member.summary: Represents a Guest user in Microsoft Entra ID (formerly Azure AD). This class extends the User class and includes additional properties related to Guest user invitations.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.UserGuest.ExternalUserState
member.summary: The external state of the user (e.g., PendingAcceptance, Accepted).

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.UserGuest.ExternalUserStateChangeDateTime
member.summary: The date and time when the external user state last changed.

member.name: P:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.UserGuest.InvitationStatus
member.summary: A derived property that represents the invitation status. Returns "Pending" if the user has not accepted the invitation, otherwise "Accepted".

member.name: M:PSMicrosoftEntraID.Users.UserGuest.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
